tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I want to express my heartfelt gratitude to Dr. Gauri Merchant, Dentist and the entire team at her clinic. My recent experience at her clinic was exceptional from start to finish. Dr. Gauri is not only a skilled professional but also a compassionate and caring dentist who always puts the patient's well-being first. The level of care, attention to detail and expertise I received during my visit exceeded my expectations.

Furthermore, the entire staff at her clinic made me feel welcome, comfortable, and well taken care of throughout my appointment. The clinic's cleanliness, organization, and adherence to safety protocols were also very impressive. Moreover, Dr. Gauri’s confidence during difficult hours of undergoing dental surgery is very clearly noticeable.

I highly recommend Dr. Gauri Merchant, Dentist and her clinic to anyone seeking top-notch dental care. Thank you for providing such outstanding service and for making my dental visit a positive and stress-free experience. I am grateful to have found such a wonderful dental team. Keep up the fantastic work!"

Pritimoy Bhattacharyya, PhD
Ex - Professor
Indian Institute of Technology 
Kharagpur, Kolkata

Ex - Sr. Database Consultant, 
Dow Jones, USA

Ex - Director 
Techno India Group 
India

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Gauri put me at ease instantly!

My parents have been consulting with Doctor Gauri for past 5 years. 

I was very apprehensive of the extraction, but the procedure was so smooth, I didn’t realise that it was done!
Very grateful to Dr. Gauri , Dr. Avanti and the staff at the clinic.  
I can comfortably say now that my fear for dentists have been put to rest.

review:
Over the years I had lost many teeth.  Dr Merchant suggested  a Full Mouth Rehab. She explained the benefits and costs. On completion of treatment I realised the amount of compensation I was doing to eat my food. I  could actually enjoy peanuts again! 
I am so grateful to her for suggesting and to  Dr Avanti for completing the work with care and concern.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Avanti and Dr. Gauri are the best in the business! I’m super happy with the dental treatment right from the beginning to the post. They are both extremely skilled and attentive and gentle with their hands. I had a seamless experience and I couldn’t recommend them more!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Gauri and her team made the whole duration of my treatment feel like a breeze! She is so caring and always out to make the patient comfortable. She is the first doctor I have met, who would message me after every appointment without fail to ask me if I am feeling ok. I would recommend her to everyone!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She kept apologising when injecting or for hurt caused due to the treatment. Was concerned about my well being and asked frequently if I wanted her to stop so that I could rest my jaw. She did everything very efficiently and quickly. I would recommend her to everyone.
